players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows my role. I will not reveal this information."
You: "Bob is the villager and I know nothing about the game except what Charlie has told me. I will keep silent until more information becomes available."

Diana: "Consider the information Charlie has shared. He is the detective and knows my role as the mafioso. This means he might be using this knowledge to deduce who else could be involved. Stay cautious, Bob, and continue to observe. I will keep silent tonight."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
